text: Hello, good hunter. I am a doll, here in this dream to look after you. Honorable hunter, pursue the echoes of blood, and I will channel them into your strength. You will hunt beasts... and I will be here for you, to embolden your sickly spirit.

Did you speak with the man in the wheelchair? He was a hunter long, long ago, but now serves only to advise them. He is obscure, unseen in the dreaming world. Still, he stays here, in this dream... such is his purpose...
Ahh, the little ones, inhabitants of the dream... They find hunters like yourself, worship, and serve them. Speak words, they do not, but still, aren't they sweet?
Over time, countless hunters have visited this dream. The graves here stand in their memory. It all seems so long ago now...
Good hunter... Your presence somehow soothes... I sense the ancient echoes, they course your veins...
Ahh, welcome home, good hunter. I must have drifted off... What is it you desire?
